about_the_game:
In 'Thin Way' an atmospheric adventure awaits you, where the city and its suburbs become your partners in parkour.

You are free to choose your path, whether it's confronting the next opponent or attempting to bypass them. Discover new routes, move faster, and weave your story together.

The game allows you to feel the adrenaline and freedom of movement, offering exciting gameplay and impressive graphics.

GAME FEATURES:


  • Parkour Freedom: Your character has unique freedom of movement. Jump, climb, perform tricks, using every surface as your platform.


  • Uncompromising Battles: Engage in dynamic and intense duels, using combinations of strikes, blocks, and special moves. Feel every hit through intense animations and realistic sound effects.


Uncover the Story: Learn who awaits you, whom you are running from, and whether you can save them.

"Thin Way" is not just a game; it's a challenge that tests your reflexes and intuition. Immerse yourself in the world of parkour, battles, and freedom - test your skills! Are you ready to accept the challenge of the urban labyrinth?

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content that is not suitable for all ages or for viewing at work: Scenes of violence or cruelty, Adult content.

name: Thin Way

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-Bit (use the latest Service Pack)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200／Intel Core i3-6300
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 560 4GB / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200／Intel Core i3-6300
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 6500 XT 4GB / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: Thin Way is an exciting platformer that combines parkour and intense fights. You are an experienced traceur in a world where towering skyscrapers, crowded high-rises, and abandoned buildings create a unique playground for your art. No opponent will halt you and no obstacle will slowdown your path
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Greek, Danish, Indonesian, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
